mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quizItem(initializedBox, stepsString, count, questionZh, stepsLength, maxUpdateTimes, answer, descriptionZh, chartPath, infoPath) VALUES('[0,2,7,2,1,5,7,1,4,8]', #{stepsString}, #{count}, #{questionZh}, #{stepsLength}, #{maxUpdateTimes}, #{answer}, #{descriptionZh}, #{chartPath}, #{infoPath});
